Title: their long time work for the cause of peace as politicians, peace society leaders, orators and authors
Author: ['Klas Pontus Arnoldson', 'Fredrik Bajer']

Title: his optical precision instruments and the spectroscopic and metrological investigations carried out with their aid
Author: ['Albert A. Michelson']

Title: his biochemical researches and his discovery of cell-free fermentation
Author: ['Eduard Buchner']

Title: in recognition of his work on the role played by protozoa in causing diseases
Author: ['Alphonse Laveran']

Title: in consideration of the power of observation, originality of imagination, virility of ideas and remarkable talent for narration which characterize the creations of this world-famous author
Author: ['Rudyard Kipling']

Title: his decisive influence upon the conduct and outcome of the Hague and Geneva Conferences
Author: ['Ernesto Teodoro Moneta']

Title: in recognition of the great merits of his theoretical and experimental investigations on the conduction of electricity by gases
Author: ['J.J. Thomson']

Title: in recognition of the great services rendered by him in his investigation and isolation of the element fluorine, and for the adoption in the service of science of the electric furnace called after him
Author: ['Henri Moissan']

Title: in recognition of their work on the structure of the nervous system
Author: ['Camillo Golgi', 'Santiago Ramón y Cajal']

Title: not only in consideration of his deep learning and critical research, but above all as a tribute to the creative energy, freshness of style, and lyrical force which characterize his poetic masterpieces
Author: ['Giosuè Carducci']

Title: his role in bringing to an end the bloody war recently waged between two of the world's great powers, Japan and Russia
Author: ['Theodore Roosevelt']

Title: his work on cathode rays
Author: ['Philipp Lenard']

Title: in recognition of his services in the advancement of organic chemistry and the chemical industry, through his work on organic dyes and hydroaromatic compounds
Author: ['Adolf von Baeyer']

Title: his investigations and discoveries in relation to tuberculosis
Author: ['Robert Koch']

Title: because of his outstanding merits as an epic writer
Author: ['Henryk Sienkiewicz']

Title: her audacity to oppose the horrors of war
Author: ['Bertha von Suttner']

Title: his investigations of the densities of the most important gases and for his discovery of argon in connection with these studies
Author: ['Lord Rayleigh']

Title: in recognition of his services in the discovery of the inert gaseous elements in air, and his determination of their place in the periodic system
Author: ['Sir William Ramsay']

Title: in recognition of his work on the physiology of digestion, through which knowledge on vital aspects of the subject has been transformed and enlarged
Author: ['Ivan Pavlov']

Title: in recognition of the numerous and brilliant compositions which, in an individual and original manner, have revived the great traditions of the Spanish drama
Author: ['Frédéric Mistral']

Title: its striving in public law to develop peaceful ties between nations and to make the laws of war more humane
Author: ['Institute of International Law']

Title: in recognition of the extraordinary services they have rendered by their joint researches on the radiation phenomena discovered by Professor Henri Becquerel
Author: ['Henri Becquerel']

Title: in recognition of the extraordinary services he has rendered to the advancement of chemistry by his electrolytic theory of dissociation
Author: ['Svante Arrhenius']

Title: in recognition of his contribution to the treatment of diseases, especially lupus vulgaris, with concentrated light radiation, whereby he has opened a new avenue for medical science
Author: ['Niels Ryberg Finsen']

Title: as a tribute to his noble, magnificent and versatile poetry, which has always been distinguished by both the freshness of its inspiration and the rare purity of its spirit
Author: ['Bjørnstjerne Bjørnson']

Title: his longstanding and devoted effort in favour of the ideas of peace and arbitration
Author: ['Randal Cremer']

Title: in recognition of the extraordinary service they rendered by their researches into the influence of magnetism upon radiation phenomena
Author: ['Hendrik A. Lorentz', 'Pieter Zeeman']

Title: in recognition of the extraordinary services he has rendered by his work on sugar and purine syntheses
Author: ['Emil Fischer']

Title: his work on malaria, by which he has shown how it enters the organism and thereby has laid the foundation for successful research on this disease and methods of combating it
Author: ['Ronald Ross']

Title: the greatest living master of the art of historical writing, with special reference to his monumental work, A history of Rome
Author: ['Theodor Mommsen']

Title: his eminently practical administration of the Inter-Parliamentary Union
Author: ['Élie Ducommun']

Title: in recognition of the extraordinary services he has rendered by the discovery of the remarkable rays subsequently named after him
Author: ['Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen']

Title: in recognition of the extraordinary services he has rendered by the discovery of the laws of chemical dynamics and osmotic pressure in solutions
Author: ["Jacobus H. van 't Hoff"]

Title: his work on serum therapy, especially its application against diphtheria, by which he has opened a new road in the domain of medical science and thereby placed in the hands of the physician a victorious weapon against illness and deaths
Author: ['Emil von Behring']

Title: in special recognition of his poetic composition, which gives evidence of lofty idealism, artistic perfection and a rare combination of the qualities of both heart and intellect
Author: ['Sully Prudhomme']

Title: his lifelong work for international peace conferences, diplomacy and arbitration
Author: ['Henry Dunant']
